title: What is Annie's age
body:
This isn't a creepy question like you think it is btw (I'm not a weirdo like that)

My sister and I always have this argument so I was wondering if anybody actually knows the answer to this one
But how old is Annie?
I say she is 9-10 but my sister says she is 7-8 so I was just wanting to find out who is right?

replies.body: The word gay arrived in English during the 12th century from Old French gai, most likely deriving ultimately from a Germanic source. In English, the word's primary meaning was "joyful", "carefree", "bright and showy", and the word was very commonly used with this meaning in speech and literature. For example, the optimistic 1890s are still often referred to as the Gay Nineties.

> [{quoted}](name=Mortis Ex,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=VI6r8NNW,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-01-14T09:41:03.239+0000)
>
> The word gay arrived in English during the 12th century from Old French gai, most likely deriving ultimately from a Germanic source. In English, the word's primary meaning was "joyful", "carefree", "bright and showy", and the word was very commonly used with this meaning in speech and literature. For example, the optimistic 1890s are still often referred to as the Gay Nineties.

https://au.toluna.com/dpolls_images/2015/08/08/c131be75-0c6f-4fa1-8868-056604a29ffd_x365.jpg

If there is grass on the field, lets play cricket. 

But seriously, treating it as a subject taboo to even discuss is a problem imo as non offending people that might otherwise come forward to be treated for a mental illness hide it to avoid the social stigma etc. To truly address any subject it must be open for discussion and one of the core behaviors of humans around taboos is to make jokes to ease the tension.

I'm ok to **talk** about it, I just don't feel comfortable with joking about it. It's like when people use the word "gay" to mean bad or horrible. I'm not trying to be an SJW about this I'm just saying I don't like pedophilia being taken so lightly that people joke about it when its such a serious matter.

> [{quoted}](name=BeerJingle,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=VI6r8NNW,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-01-14T06:04:47.661+0000)
>
> I'm ok to **talk** about it, I just don't feel comfortable with joking about it. It's like when people use the word "gay" to mean bad or horrible. I'm not trying to be an SJW about this I'm just saying I don't like pedophilia being taken so lightly that people joke about it when its such a serious matter.

Whats wrong with calling things I hate gay????????? Gay person here btw
Please don't make those jokes. Pedophillia is one of the few subjects that I believe shouldn't be joked about
Niji talking about pedophilia? Wouldn't be surprised, all shitposters are generally the same.

> [{quoted}](name=BeerJingle,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=VI6r8NNW,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-01-14T02:20:59.206+0000)
>
> Please don't make those jokes. Pedophillia is one of the few subjects that I believe shouldn't be joked about

Though I want to point out: Pedophilia doesn't bring about the shitstorm because of someone just so happens to like younger kids more, nor is it because that it's scientifically wrong in particular as our genitals are matured enough to be capable of producing offsprings before turning 10 years old, but because of moral reasons that determine children below a certain age are highly unlikely to be capable of understanding consequences and be mentally mature enough to make big decisions on their own without outside influences and thus "special relationships" are legally banned prior to that certain age for that reason.

That and pedophilia is often associated with child-rape, even though that's a problem to do with rape itself rather than having to do with someone's sexual preferences, because rape can happen to any sex and any age regardless of the culprit's personal sexual preferences. A rapist is wrong because they rape and not because what their ideal partner is, nor is the latter factor contributing or instigating the likeness of committing the said crime.

What I'm trying to get to is that indeed, it's no joking matter, but we also shouldn't ust completely avoid it like it's the next Black Death either. And we should always trying to get better picture of the matters and how things are rather than following what is said.

But anyway, just doodling.

> [{quoted}](name=SEKAI,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=VI6r8NNW,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-01-14T10:30:12.571+0000)
>
 children below a certain age are highly unlikely to be capable of understanding consequences and be mentally mature enough to make big decisions on their own without outside influences

Arent we talking about a little psycho that loves setting people on fire and laughing about it? Some arcane prodigy that permanently ensorcelled a poor magical bear and keeps it as a slave so she can throw it at people and kill them?

> [{quoted}](name=Mortis Ex,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=VI6r8NNW,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2017-01-14T13:47:44.982+0000)
> 
> Arent we talking about a little psycho that loves setting people on fire and laughing about it? Some arcane prodigy that permanently ensorcelled a poor magical bear and keeps it as a slave so she can throw it at people and kill them?

Yes we are.

Annie is like gay 40 yrs old.

She's a demon-courting witch who's retained the form of an adolescent child.

JUST TELL ME THIS DOES NOT MAKE SENSE.

Annie's release was on 2009-2-21
So I'd say nearly 8.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ez8UOfqlX64
Nothing should be considered too serious for jokes. Here is a pretty good article on why.
http://www.spiked-online.com/newsite/article/should-anything-be-beyond-a-joke/17964
"Good jokes are generally in bad taste. They tend to mock the respectable rules and morals of society. By its nature comedy is always controversial, pushing as it must at the limits of what passes for taste and decency in any era. It is hard to think of a good joke that would not offend somebody. That is why there have long been attempts to control what is deemed ‘acceptable’ humour and to censor what is not. And why many writers and comedians have tried to subvert the rules. However, as with other issues in the free-speech wars, the terrain has shifted. Once the complaints were about blasphemous and indecent comedy, and the censors were conservative politicians, policemen and priests. Now the protests are more often against comedians accused of breaking the new taboos – racism, sexism, ableism, homophobia, transphobia, Islamophobia, anti-Semitism and the other usual suspects. And the demands to shut them down tend to be led not by old-fashioned prudes but by radical online activists, the liberal media and even other comedians. Backed up in the UK by broadcast regulators, politicians and the newly PC police."

I was always under the impression she was around 11 or 12...

Can't find anything about how old she actually is on the LoL wiki or Google, just a bunch of speculation (most of which seems to be around 8-11).
